trans-unit.source: Displays a button-like user interface (UI) for use in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Apresenta uma interface de utilizador como o botão (IU) para utilização num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewButtonCell class is a specialized type of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> used to display a button-like UI.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DataGridViewButtonCell é um tipo especializado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>utilizado para apresentar uma IU de como o botão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn> is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn>o tipo de coluna é especializado para armazenar as células deste tipo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is initialized to a new DataGridViewButtonCell.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é inicializada para um novo DataGridViewButtonCell.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To pattern the cells within a column after an existing DataGridViewButtonCell, set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to the cell to use as a pattern.
trans-unit.target: Para o padrão de células na coluna após um DataGridViewButtonCell existente, defina a coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade à célula para utilizar como um padrão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To respond to user button clicks, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Para responder a cliques de botão de utilizador, processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the event handler, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine whether the click occurred a the button column.
trans-unit.target: De eventos processador, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para determinar se a, clique em Ocorreu uma coluna de botão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine whether the click occurred in a particular button cell.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para determinar se a, clique em ocorreu numa célula botão específico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades relacionadas com a célula da coluna são wrappers para as propriedades da mesma forma-com o nome da célula de modelo.

trans-unit.source: Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change.
trans-unit.target: Alterar os valores de propriedade da célula modelo irá afetar apenas células com base no modelo que são adicionadas após a alteração.

trans-unit.source: Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Alterar os valores de propriedade relacionados com a célula da coluna, no entanto, irá atualizar a célula de modelo e todos os outras células na coluna e atualize a apresentação de coluna, se necessário.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>, and cell styles specified through properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> have no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando estilos visuais estiverem ativados, os botões numa coluna botão são desenhados utilizando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>e célula estilos especificados através de propriedades, tais como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>não tem qualquer efeito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata esta célula.

trans-unit.source: Override the Clone method whenever you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> and add new properties to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Substitua o método de Clone sempre que derivar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>e adicione novas propriedades à classe derivada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o clonado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessible object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto acessível para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se não chame o método CreateAccessibilityInstance explicitamente, este será chamado quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>propriedade é referenciada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Obter ou definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>propriedade, tem de adicionar uma referência à assemblagem acessibilidade instalada com o .NET Framework.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.DataGridViewButtonCellAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.DataGridViewButtonCellAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.DataGridViewButtonCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the cell's hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controlo de edição alojada da célula.

trans-unit.source: This overridden property always returns `null` because there is no associated Windows hosted control; the button-like user interface is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade substituída sempre devolve `null` porque não está associado não o Windows alojados controlo; a interface de utilizador como o botão é composta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the underlying editing control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>do controlo de edição subjacente.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style determining the button's appearance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de determinar o aspecto do botão.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.FlatStyle%2A> property of the owning column also sets the FlatStyle property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.FlatStyle%2A>propriedade da coluna proprietário também define a propriedade FlatStyle de cada célula da coluna e atualiza a apresentação de coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando a definição desta propriedade não é um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the formatted value associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo do valor formatado associado a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> representing the type of the cell's formatted value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>que representa o tipo de célula do formatado valor.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area, which is calculated using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and cell style.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o retângulo delimitador que encloses área conteúdo da célula, que é calculada utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> e o estilo da célula.

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de gráficos para a célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> a aplicar à célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha de principal da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> bounds que o conteúdo da célula.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's error icon, if one is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o retângulo delimitador que encloses ícone de erro da célula, se um é apresentado.

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de gráficos para a célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> a aplicar à célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha de principal da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's error icon, if one is displayed; otherwise, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que bounds ícone de erro da célula, se estiver apresentado; caso contrário, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Calcula o tamanho preferencial, em pixels, da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizada para desenhar a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo da célula.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based row index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero de linha da célula.

trans-unit.source: The cell's maximum allowable size.
trans-unit.target: Tamanho máximo permitido a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho preferencial, em pixels, da célula.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the text associated with the button.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto associado ao botão.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to retrieve the text of a cell in a shared row, which cannot store cell values locally and remain shared.
trans-unit.target: Este método é útil para obter o texto de uma célula numa linha partilhada, que não é possível armazenar os valores localmente e permanecem partilhado.

trans-unit.source: You must pass in the actual row index because shared rows have indexes of -1.
trans-unit.target: Tem de passar no índice de linha real porque linhas partilhadas tem índices de -1.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a partilha de linha, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha de principal da célula.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"></xref> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*> value of the owning column if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"> </xref> ou <> </> *> valor da coluna de proprietário se <> </> *> é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row is unshared if a key is pressed while the focus is on a cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: Indica se uma linha sem se uma tecla é premida enquanto o foco é uma célula na linha.

trans-unit.source: The KeyDownUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnKeyDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método de KeyDownUnsharesRow é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnKeyDown%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnKeyDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnKeyDown%2A> with the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> argument has the effect of unsharing the row `rowIndex`.
trans-unit.target: Tem de devolver `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnKeyDown%2A>com o mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>argumento tem o efeito de unsharing a linha `rowIndex`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnKeyDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Deverá devolver `false` caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a partilha de linha, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha de principal da célula.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user pressed the SPACE key without modifier keys; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o utilizador premido a chave de espaço sem chaves modificador; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row is unshared when a key is released while the focus is on a cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: Indica se uma linha sem quando uma tecla é premida enquanto o foco é uma célula na linha.

trans-unit.source: The KeyUpUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnKeyUp%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método de KeyUpUnsharesRow é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnKeyUp%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnKeyUp%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnKeyUp%2A> with the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> argument has the effect of unsharing the row `rowIndex`.
trans-unit.target: Tem de devolver `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnKeyUp%2A>com o mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs>argumento tem o efeito de unsharing a linha `rowIndex`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnKeyUp%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Deverá devolver `false` caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a partilha de linha, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha de principal da célula.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user released the SPACE key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o utilizador lançada a chave de espaço; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row will be unshared when the mouse button is held down while the pointer is on a cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: Indica se uma linha estará sem quando o botão do rato é mantido enquanto o ponteiro for de uma célula na linha.

trans-unit.source: The MouseDownUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnMouseDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método de MouseDownUnsharesRow é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnMouseDown%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnMouseDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnMouseDown%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row `rowIndex`.
trans-unit.target: Tem de devolver `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnMouseDown%2A>tem o efeito de unsharing a linha `rowIndex`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnMouseDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Deverá devolver `false` caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a partilha de linha, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user pressed the left mouse button; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o utilizador premido o botão do rato esquerdo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row will be unshared when the mouse pointer moves over a cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: Indica se uma linha estará sem quando o ponteiro do rato se move sobre uma célula na linha.

trans-unit.source: The MouseEnterUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnMouseEnter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método de MouseEnterUnsharesRow é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnMouseEnter%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnMouseEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnMouseEnter%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row `rowIndex`.
trans-unit.target: Tem de devolver `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnMouseEnter%2A>tem o efeito de unsharing a linha `rowIndex`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnMouseEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Deverá devolver `false` caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a partilha de linha, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The row index of the current cell, or -1 if the cell is not owned by a row.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula actual ou -1 se a célula não pertence a uma linha.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell was the last cell receiving a mouse click; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula foi a última célula receber um rato clique; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row will be unshared when the mouse pointer leaves the row.
trans-unit.target: Indica se uma linha estará sem quando o ponteiro do rato deixa a linha.

trans-unit.source: The MouseLeaveUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnMouseLeave%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método de MouseLeaveUnsharesRow é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: MouseLeaveUnsharesRow must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnMouseLeave%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row specified by `rowIndex`.
trans-unit.target: Tem de devolver MouseLeaveUnsharesRow `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>tem o efeito de unsharing a linha especificada pelo `rowIndex`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Deverá devolver `false` caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a partilha de linha, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The row index of the current cell, or -1 if the cell is not owned by a row.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula actual ou -1 se a célula não pertence a uma linha.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the button displayed by the cell is in the pressed state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o botão apresentado pela célula está no Estado premido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row will be unshared when the mouse button is released while the pointer is on a cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: Indica se uma linha estará sem quando o botão do rato é libertado enquanto o ponteiro for de uma célula na linha.

trans-unit.source: The MouseUpUnsharesRow method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnMouseUp%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método de MouseUpUnsharesRow é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnMouseUp%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnMouseUp%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnMouseUp%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row.
trans-unit.target: Tem de devolver `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnMouseUp%2A>tem o efeito de unsharing a linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.OnMouseUp%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Deverá devolver `false` caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a partilha de linha, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the left mouse button was released; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o botão do rato esquerdo foi libertado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when a character key is pressed while the focus is on the cell.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando uma chave de carateres é premida enquanto o foco incide na célula.

trans-unit.source: When activated by the SPACE key, this method updates the cell's user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Quando ativado, a chave de espaço, este método de atualizações de interface de utilizador (IU) da célula.

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyDown%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é semelhante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyDown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyDown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: Denomina-se nas mesmas circunstâncias em que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>o evento é gerado, mas não gere, na verdade, o evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the current cell, or -1 if the cell is not owned by a row.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula actual ou -1 se a célula não pertence a uma linha.

trans-unit.source: Called when a character key is released while the focus is on the cell.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando uma tecla de caráter é premida enquanto o foco incide na célula.

trans-unit.source: When activated by the SPACE key, this method updates the cell's user interface (UI) and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellClick%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellContentClick%2A> events on the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Quando ativado, a chave de espaço, este método de interface de utilizador (IU) da célula de atualizações e gera os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellClick%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellContentClick%2A>eventos no proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellContentClick%2A> e</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é semelhante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: Denomina-se nas mesmas circunstâncias em que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName>o evento é gerado, mas não gere, na verdade, o evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento

trans-unit.source: The row index of the current cell, or -1 if the cell is not owned by a row.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula actual ou -1 se a célula não pertence a uma linha.

trans-unit.source: Called when the focus moves from the cell.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando move o foco da célula.

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é semelhante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: Denomina-se nas mesmas circunstâncias em que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave?displayProperty=fullName>o evento é gerado, mas não gere, na verdade, o evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The row index of the current cell, or -1 if the cell is not owned by a row.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula actual ou -1 se a célula não pertence a uma linha.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if focus left the cell as a result of user mouse click; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if focus left due to a programmatic cell change.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula como resultado de rato de utilizador à esquerda de foco clique; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se foco deixado devido a uma alteração de célula programática.

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse button is held down while the pointer is on the cell.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o botão do rato é mantido enquanto o ponteiro estiver na célula.

trans-unit.source: If activated by depressing the left mouse button, this method updates the cell's user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Se ativado por depressing botão esquerdo do rato, este método de atualizações de interface de utilizador (IU) da célula.

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseDown%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é semelhante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseDown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseDown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: Denomina-se nas mesmas circunstâncias em que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>o evento é gerado, mas não gere, na verdade, o evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse pointer moves out of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o ponteiro do rato se move fora da célula.

trans-unit.source: If the cell's button is not in its normal state, this method causes the cell's user interface (UI) to be updated.
trans-unit.target: Se o botão da célula não está no respetivo estado normal, este método faz com que a interface de utilizador a célula (IU) a serem atualizados.

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é semelhante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: Denomina-se nas mesmas circunstâncias em que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>o evento é gerado, mas não gere, na verdade, o evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: The row index of the current cell, or -1 if the cell is not owned by a row.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula actual ou -1 se a célula não pertence a uma linha.

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse pointer moves while it is over the cell.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o ponteiro do rato se move enquanto este estiver através de célula.

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é semelhante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: Denomina-se nas mesmas circunstâncias em que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>o evento é gerado, mas não gere, na verdade, o evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse button is released while the pointer is on the cell.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o botão do rato é libertado enquanto o ponteiro for na célula.

trans-unit.source: If activated by the left mouse button, this method updates the cell's user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Se ativado, o botão esquerdo do rato, este método de atualizações de interface de utilizador (IU) da célula.

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é semelhante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: Denomina-se nas mesmas circunstâncias em que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName>o evento é gerado, mas não gere, na verdade, o evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Paints the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Desenha atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizado para a célula de pintura.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa a área do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> que tem de ser repainted.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que contém os limites da célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> valores que especifica o estado da célula.

trans-unit.source: The data of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Os dados da célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The formatted data of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Os dados formatados da célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: An error message that is associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma mensagem de erro que está associada a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que contém informações de formatação e estilo sobre a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que contém os estilos do limite para a célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values that specifies which parts of the cell need to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> valores que especifica que as partes da célula tem de ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a representação de cadeia da célula.

trans-unit.source: The string representation that is returned includes the row index and column index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: A representação de cadeia que é devolvida inclui o índice da linha e o índice de coluna da célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the current cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que representa a célula actual.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the owning column's text will appear on the button displayed by the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o texto da coluna proprietário aparecerá no botão apresentado pela célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> of a button cell is displayed as text on the button.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>de botão de um célula é apresentada como texto no botão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The UseColumnTextForButtonValue property allows you to either set the button text for each cell, or to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A> property value of the parent column for all of the button cells.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade UseColumnTextForButtonValue permite-lhe optar por definir o texto do botão para cada célula ou utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A>valor da propriedade da coluna principal para todas as células do botão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property of the owning column also sets the UseColumnTextForButtonValue property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>propriedade da coluna proprietário também define a propriedade UseColumnTextForButtonValue de cada célula da coluna e atualiza a apresentação de coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*> property will automatically match the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the owning column; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*>propriedade corresponderá automaticamente o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade da coluna proprietário; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data type of the values in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de dados dos valores existentes na célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> representing the data type of the value in the cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>que representa o tipo de dados do valor na célula.</xref:System.Type>
